trans-unit.source: Represents an error that occurs when a dynamic bind in the C# runtime binder is processed.
trans-unit.target: 代表 C# 執行階段繫結的動態繫結處理時，就會發生的錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Exceptions of this kind differ from <xref:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.RuntimeBinderInternalCompilerException> in that RuntimeBinderException represents a failure to bind in the sense of a usual compiler error, whereas <xref:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.RuntimeBinderInternalCompilerException> represents a malfunctioning of the runtime binder itself.
trans-unit.target: 這種例外狀況的不同<xref:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.RuntimeBinderInternalCompilerException>RuntimeBinderException 代表一般的編譯器錯誤，因為繫結失敗，而<xref:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.RuntimeBinderInternalCompilerException>代表執行階段繫結器本身發生故障。</xref:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.RuntimeBinderInternalCompilerException> </xref:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.RuntimeBinderInternalCompilerException>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.RuntimeBinderException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.RuntimeBinderException"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "DefaultMessageDisplayedByParameterlessCtorWriterMustSupply" This message takes into account the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>屬性的新執行個體的系統提供的訊息描述錯誤，例如"DefaultMessageDisplayedByParameterlessCtorWriterMustSupply"這個訊息會考量目前系統文化特性。</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.InsufficientMemoryException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示<xref:System.InsufficientMemoryException>.</xref:System.InsufficientMemoryException>的執行個體的初始屬性值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The localized error message string.|
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|當地語系化的錯誤訊息字串。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.RuntimeBinderException"></xref> class that has a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.RuntimeBinderException"></xref>類別具有指定的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.RuntimeBinderException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示<xref:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.RuntimeBinderException>.</xref:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.RuntimeBinderException>的執行個體的初始屬性值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string specified in `message`.|
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|錯誤訊息字串中指定`message`。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the exception.
trans-unit.target: 描述例外狀況訊息。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式的呼叫端，才能確保這個字串已經被當地語系化為目前的系統文化特性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.RuntimeBinderException"></xref> class that has serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.RuntimeBinderException"></xref>已序列化資料的類別。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 重新建構所需的資料流上傳輸的例外狀況物件的還原序列化期間呼叫這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown..
trans-unit.target: 物件，該物件保存所擲回的例外狀況的相關序列化的物件資料...

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 關於來源或目的端內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.RuntimeBinderException"></xref> class that has a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.RuntimeBinderException"></xref>類別具有指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 做為前一個例外狀況直接結果應該包括在前一個例外狀況的參考就會擲回的例外狀況<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性會傳回相同的值傳遞到建構函式，或`null`如果<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.RuntimeBinderException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示<xref:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.RuntimeBinderException>.</xref:Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder.RuntimeBinderException>的執行個體的初始屬性值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string specified in `message`.|
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|錯誤訊息字串中指定`message`。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解釋例外狀況的原因的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or a null reference if no inner exception is specified.
trans-unit.target: 如果不指定了任何內部例外狀況會造成目前例外狀況，則為 null 參考例外狀況。
